definition: crowded/framework for silkworms/gather foliage/bunch/classifier for bunched objects
to hold/to embrace/to wrap around/to gather around (sb)/to throng/to swarm/to support/Taiwan pr. [yong3]

sentences.english: He was mobbed wherever he went.
sentences.chinese: 无论走到哪里，他都被人们簇拥着。

sentences.english: and people were all in the streets, you know.
Sometime after midnight, the groom, accompanied by his many guests, proceeds to the house of the bride.
sentences.chinese: 午夜时分，新郎会由众多宾客簇拥着前去新娘家。

sentences.english: Other people clustered around them forming a human wall .
sentences.chinese: 其他人簇拥在他们的周围，形成一道人墙。

sentences.english: Zhongtian Gate mountains wide valley, surrounded by pavilions.
sentences.chinese: 中天门峻岭阔谷，楼阁簇拥。

sentences.english: Her maidens gave a sharp cry and crowded around the goddess.
sentences.chinese: 仙女们发出刺耳的尖叫，簇拥在她身旁。

sentences.english: People crowded round the player with congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 人们簇拥着那个运动员向他祝贺。

sentences.english: Our school is beautiful. Our teaching building is surrounded with trees and flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校环境优美，教学楼被花草树木簇拥着。

sentences.english: Go to sleep, now, dear love, 'neath roses above.
sentences.chinese: 睡觉吧我的小宝贝，在玫瑰花的簇拥之下。

sentences.english: Journalist are constantly harangued by over-eager entrepreneurs.
sentences.chinese: 记者们周围往往簇拥着一群迫不及待的创业者。

sentences.english: You see, this gingko tree is embraced by many smaller gingko trees.
sentences.chinese: 你看，这株银杏树的周围簇拥着许多小银杏树。

sentences.english: The king fared forth, attended by all his servants.
sentences.chinese: 国王启程了，身边簇拥着所有的仆人。

sentences.english: Escorted by a large crowd of people, the cold and elegant actress finally appeared.
sentences.chinese: 在众人的簇拥下，表情高冷的女影星终于出现了。

sentences.english: Subsequently, many people wanted to come, surrounded him to the front of the store to discuss that.
sentences.chinese: 随后，不少人聚拢过来，簇拥着他到店门口要讨说法。
细沙簇拥着我们的脚印。

sentences.english: Even though I didn't have butterflies and bees around me like spring flowers did, I still looked beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我没有春风抚慰也没有蜂蝶簇拥，但依然美丽。

definition: one after the other/in single file
to file out/to walk out in a line
to walk in in a line
see 眾星捧月|众星捧月[zhong4 xing1 peng3 yue4]
lit. all the stars cup themselves around the moon (idiom, from Analects); fig. to view sb as core figure/to group around a revered leader/to revolve around sb
a narrow street (lined with walls)/to line the street
to line the streets in welcome
